recipesJson.name: Jerry and Ben’s Strawberry cheesecake Icecream
recipesJson.author: BigRed
recipesJson.description: this recipes to taste like Ben and jerry’s strawberry cheesecake ice cream . It needs a few days steep to taste perfect but here ya go give it a try i’m sure you could sub the strawberry if needed

reviews.text: This is really nice but I added 0.5% of red touch, shisha strawberry, and ripe strawberry to amp up the strawberry taste along with less sweetener, and its giving me more of what I want.  Great recipe!

pageContext.name: Jerry and Ben’s Strawberry cheesecake Icecream
